nav.div: Dodgeville School District » DISTRICT » Extended School Closure Updates » Communication Updates

strong.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 20px; letter-spacing: 0.3px; text-align: center;
strong.br:
DSD Information Regarding COVID-19 (Coronavirus)
NO SCHOOL UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE

p.span: The Dodgeville School District will be offering non-traditional learning experiences until further guidance is provided by Governor Tony Evers. If you have any questions or concerns about what this specifically means for each of your students please contact your teacher or the main office where your student attends.
We would like to reassure you that keeping our students and staff members healthy and safe is our top priority.
To help protect you and your family, please follow these basic health practices set by the Wisconsin Department of Public Health:

- Wash your hands frequently
- Cover your nose and mouth when you cough or sneeze
- Stay home
- Follow the Center for Disease Control’s travel guidance
We will keep you informed as we hear from our state agencies and as we plan locally for our own circumstances.

p.style: margin-bottom: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; line-height: normal;
